Name: Boom 3D
About the game: Boom 3D is a pro audio enhancement app that has been designed to play all your media content with incredible 3D effects on ANY headphones /speakers, from any player, any media, any streaming services. Specially designed for gaming, our multi-channel 3D surround brings unmatched clarity to every game interaction. From the muted footsteps of your opponent to the roar of a dragon, Boom 3D renders the detail in all its crispness and clarity, leading you to victory! With Boom, 3D gaming becomes a truly immersive experience.
